results.title: Voriconazole-Induced Hepatitis via Simvastatin- and Lansoprazole-Mediated Drug Interactions: A Case Report and Review of the Literature.
results.text_hl: After the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ took 10 mg @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ daily for 2 weeks, @<m>DISEASE_Cholestasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002779 @@@cholestatic hepatitis@@@ occurred.

results.title: Simvastatin in primary biliary cirrhosis: effects on serum lipids and distinct disease markers.
results.text_hl: The drug might also prove useful as modulator of @<m>DISEASE_Cholestasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002779 @@@cholestasis@@@ and of immune response in this disease.

results.title: Rhabdomyolysis in a patient taking simvastatin after addition of cyclosporine therapy.
results.text_hl: We explore the interaction between @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Cyclosporine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016572 @@@CsA@@@, including effects on hepatic microsomal metabolism via the @GENE_CYP4F3 @GENE_4051 @@@cytochrome P-450@@@ pathway, @<m>DISEASE_Cholestasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002779 @@@cholestasis@@@, and myoblast histology, with a review of previous literature regarding @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@HMG-CoA reductase@@@ inhibitors (HMGRIs) and @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@.

citations.NLM: Hong R, Sequeira W. Rhabdomyolysis in a patient taking simvastatin after addition of cyclosporine therapy. J Clin Rheumatol. 2000 Dec;6(6):324-7. PMID: 19078494
citations.BibTeX: @article{19078494, title={Rhabdomyolysis in a patient taking simvastatin after addition of cyclosporine therapy.}, author={Hong R and Sequeira W}, journal={J Clin Rheumatol}, volume={6}, number={6}, pages={324-7}}

results.title: Hepatotoxicity of hydroxy-methyl-glutaryl-coenzyme A reductase inhibitors.
results.text_hl: The personal observation of a case of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced acute @<m>DISEASE_Cholestasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002779 @@@cholestatic hepatitis@@@ prompted us to evaluate the true incidence of @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@hepatic side effects@@@ of these drugs in a large Italian population.

citations.NLM: Ballarè M, Campanini M, Airoldi G, Zaccala G, Bertoncelli MC, Cornaglia G, Porzio M, Monteverde A. Hepatotoxicity of hydroxy-methyl-glutaryl-coenzyme A reductase inhibitors. Minerva Gastroenterol Dietol. 1992 Jan-Mar;38(1):41-4. PMID: 1520752

results.title: miR-33 controls the expression of biliary transporters, and mediates statin- and diet-induced hepatotoxicity
results.text_hl: Finally, we compared the expression of selected transcripts in the livers of @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ gavaged saline or 50 mpk @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (mildly @<m>DISEASE_Cholestasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002779 @@@cholestatic@@@, based on @CHEMICAL_Barium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001464 @@@BA@@@ accumulation) (Fig 6G).
